dict.string: CTA Transit Assistant needs your location to find the nearest CTA L station and display real-time train arrival times. Your location is only used to determine proximity to stations and is not shared.
CTA Transit Assistant uses Bluetooth to connect to Meta AI Glasses for hands-free audio announcements of train arrivals and schedules. Bluetooth is required to stream audio to your glasses.
Optional: Record transit incidents for safety. Session-based, only when you tap to start.
Optional: Capture audio with safety recordings. Only when recording is active.
